alert.note: Alert for Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:31PM EDT until September 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WARREN AND WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 730 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glens Falls North, or near Glens Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Glens Falls, Lake George Village, Glens Falls North, West Glens Falls, Queensbury, Kingsbury, Lake George, Fort Ann, Cleverdale, French Mountain, Diamond Point, Pilot Knob, Pattens Mills, West Fort Ann, Vaughns Corners, Oneida Corners, Tripoli, Paradise Beach, Brayton and Crosbyside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
